heroSection.title: The intelligent platform for productive food management
heroSection.subtitle: Optimize your operations with customizable modules for shrimp farms, livestock, tilapia, and more.
heroSection.description: Discover how to automate your production, visualize data in real time, and reduce costs from day one.

aboutSection.title: We build tools for those who feed the world
aboutSection.description: We are a SaaS platform designed for food producers who seek efficiency, control, and scalability. From small farms to industrial operations, our technology adapts to every productive process.
aboutSection.point1: Adaptable technology from small farms to industrial operations
aboutSection.point2: Facilitates monitoring, decision-making, and team collaboration

servicesSection.title: Integrated solutions for every stage of your production
servicesSection.subtitle: Powerful and flexible tools that adapt to every stage of your production process

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Full control over supplies, feed, and resources.

cycles.title: Cycle Automation
cycles.description: Monitor and plan your processes with precision.

forecasting.title: Profit Forecasting
forecasting.description: Visualize potential earnings and critical points.

users.title: User & Role Management
users.description: Secure permissions tailored to each team.

reports.title: Dynamic Reports
reports.description: Export data to PDF, Excel, or CSV in seconds.

notifications.title: Multi-Channel Notifications
notifications.description: Stay informed with in-app alerts and emails.

cta.title: Need a custom solution?
cta.description: Our team can adapt any functionality to your specific needs

modulesSection.title: Modules that adapt to your operation
modulesSection.description: From the pond to the corral, choose the modules you need and add them anytime.

shrimp.title: Shrimp Module
shrimp.description: Manage pools, cycles, feeding, and complete sanitary tracking to maximize your aquaculture production.

cattle.title: Cattle Module
cattle.description: Track herds, breeding, weight history, and reproductive control to optimize your livestock.

tilapia.title: Tilapia Module
tilapia.description: Manage floating cages, feeding, and harvest for efficient fish farming.

poultry.title: Poultry Module
poultry.description: Control layers, broilers, inventory, and daily production.

cta.title: Can't find the module you need?
cta.description: We work with you to develop custom modules that perfectly adapt to your specific operation
